text: The countries where people speak Italian language, is one of the spoken widely in the world among the Portuguese, Spanish and French originated in the Western Europe region, It is influenced by the Romance languages in Common Era, The standard Italian is majority in Milan and Rome. ==Spoken by the countries== In some areas in Western countries the language is also spoken across in New England (U.S.), Saskatchewan (Canada), Costa Rica and Panama. The Argentine Italian is one of the major dialect into native Argentines, alongwith the Spanish language. ==Related pages== * English-speaking population * German-speaking population * French-speaking population * Spanish-speaking population * Portuguese-speaking population * Italian Americans ==References== Category:Lists of countries Category:Italian language * Italian
title: List of countries by Italian-speaking population
